channel.title: When I restart server people can't get on
channel.description:
Ok the title says it basically. But I this happens on EVERY update. When I finish my update and I restart compile people can't get on. And new people can. So the people that got lagged out have to restart there comp to get back on. Can anyone help??
-Stone
